messages.title: Standing Up for Real Change
messages.content:
Dear Voter,

My priorities are deficit reduction, leading to lower taxes for everybody, reducing government interference in our lives and making it easier for businesses to thrive. I am also a great believer in democracy and support “recall” so voters can sack their underperforming MP and call a by-election.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Prioritizing deficit reduction to enable lowering of taxes for everyone.
Reducing government interference to help businesses thrive.
A firm believer in democracy, supporting the concept of 'recall' for voters to be able to sack underperforming MPs.

issues.economy: Prioritizing deficit reduction to enable lowering of taxes for everyone.
issues.governance: A firm believer in democracy, supporting the concept of 'recall' for voters to be able to sack underperforming MPs.

housing.content: I know that local housing is very expensive; we must not price young people out of Guildford.

leaflet.personalStatement: I run an export business, and as an employer, I am acutely aware of the problems facing small businesses. Living in Guildford, I know that local housing is very expensive; we must not price young people out of Guildford.

images.caption: Harry Aldridge for UKIP in Guildford
